ddf.catalog.impl.operations

Class ResourceOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.util.impl.DescribableImpl
      • ddf.catalog.impl.operations.ResourceOperations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Describable

    public class ResourceOperations
extends DescribableImpl
    Support class for resource delegate operations for the CatalogFrameworkImpl.

    This class contains six delegated resource methods and methods to support them. No operations/support methods should be added to this class except in support of CFI resource operations.

      • getResourceInfo

        protected ResourceOperations.ResourceInfo getResourceInfo(ResourceRequest resourceRequest,
                                                          String site,
                                                          boolean isEnterprise,
                                                          StringBuilder federatedSite,
                                                          Map<String,Serializable> requestProperties,
                                                          boolean fanoutEnabled)
                                                   throws ResourceNotSupportedException,
                                                          ResourceNotFoundException
        Retrieves a resource by URI.

        The ResourceRequest can specify either the product's URI or ID. If the product ID is specified, then the matching Metacard must first be retrieved and the product URI extracted from this Metacard.

        Parameters:
        resourceRequest -
        site -
        isEnterprise -
        federatedSite -
        requestProperties -
        fanoutEnabled -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ResourceNotSupportedException
        ResourceNotFoundException

      • validateFixGetResourceResponse

        protected ResourceResponse validateFixGetResourceResponse(ResourceResponse getResourceResponse,
                                                          ResourceRequest getResourceRequest)
                                                   throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Validates that the ResourceResponse has a Resource in it that was retrieved, and that the original ResourceRequest is included in the response.
        Parameters:
        getResourceResponse - the original ResourceResponse returned from the source
        getResourceRequest - the original ResourceRequest sent to the source
        Returns:
        the updated ResourceResponse
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if the original ResourceResponse is null or the resource could not be found

      • validateGetResourceRequest

        protected void validateGetResourceRequest(ResourceRequest getResourceRequest)
                                   throws ResourceNotSupportedException
        Validates that the ResourceRequest is non-null, a non-null attribute name (which specifies if the retrieval is being done by product URI or ID), and a non-null attribute value.
        Parameters:
        getResourceRequest - the ResourceRequest
        Throws:
        ResourceNotSupportedException - if the ResourceRequest is null, or has a null attribute value or name
